events.message: I want to request a refund for my recent order because the product did not meet my expectations and I am very disappointed.
The customer's issue has been categorized as a refund request based on their message indicating dissatisfaction and a desire for money back.
The support case has been assigned to agent Sarah Wells, who specializes in refund processing and customer satisfaction.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I'm here to assist you with your refund request and help resolve your concerns quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the product was opened or used, so we can proceed with the refund process properly?
Thank you for your response. My order number is 987654321, and I have not used or opened the product. I just want to return it for a full refund.
We have initiated the refund process for your order 987654321. Please use the prepaid return shipping label we will send shortly to return the unopened product.
Thanks for your help! I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions for the return shipment.
We have confirmed receipt of your returned product and processed your refund. The amount should be credited to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been completed successfully and you have not reported further issues, we are closing this support case now.
